## Type.getFullyQualifiedName() method

Gets the fully qualified name of the type, to allow for better (efficient and non-ambiguous) type comparison within the custom typesystem.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFullyQualifiedName(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string
